concept.title: Non-normative references
concept.shortdesc: Non-normative references are references to external documents or resources that implementers of DITA might find useful.

dlentry.dd: OASIS Committee Specification 02, Customer Information Quality Specifications Version 3.0. Name (xNL), Address (xAL), Name and Address (xNAL) and Party (xPIL), , 20 September 2008.
